title: Hero MotoCorp to collaborate with US-based Zero Motorcycles on premium electric bikes
description: In September 2022, Hero MotoCorp's board approved an equity investment of up to USD 60 million in California-based Zero Motorcycles, a leading player in electric motorcycles and powertrains.
